query.name: get_asset_by_id
query.sql: SELECT uplink_equipment.*, uplink_equipment_type.name as equipment_type_name, uplink_location_address.location_address_id, uplink_location_equipment.equipment_id, uplink_equipment_type_images.equipment_type_image_id FROM uplink_equipment, uplink_equipment_type, uplink_location_address, uplink_location_equipment, uplink_equipment_type_images WHERE uplink_equipment.deletion_datetime > ? AND uplink_equipment.account_id = ? AND uplink_equipment.equipment_type_id=uplink_equipment_type.equipment_type_id AND uplink_equipment.equipment_id=? AND uplink_location_address.deletion_datetime > ? AND uplink_location_equipment.deletion_datetime > ? AND uplink_location_equipment.equipment_id = ? AND uplink_location_equipment.location_address_id=uplink_location_address.location_address_id AND uplink_equipment_type_images.equipment_type_id=uplink_equipment_type.equipment_type_id AND uplink_equipment_type_images.deletion_datetime > ?
